channel.title: Projects on Chang Luo
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chang Luo

item.description: 基于蚁群算法的证券投资组合优化 body { background: #FFF; font-family: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 30px; text-align: center; margin: 0; padding: 0; } h1 { font-size: 60px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; font-family: 'Chelsea Market', Georgia, serif; color: #000; line-height: 1; } h2 { font-size: 70px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; color: #FFB000; font-family: 'Chelsea Market', Georgia, serif; text-transform: lowercase; } h3 { font-size: 40px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; margin-top: 40px; text-transform: lowercase; } p { width: 960px; margin: 40px auto; color: #000; line-height: 200%; } a, a:visited { color: #000; font-size: 12px; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } ul { list-style: none; } .

基于蚁群算法的证券投资组合优化 body { background: #FFF; font-family: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 30px; text-align: center; margin: 0; padding: 0; } h1 { font-size: 60px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; font-family: 'Chelsea Market', Georgia, serif; color: #000; line-height: 1; } h2 { font-size: 70px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; color: #FFB000; font-family: 'Chelsea Market', Georgia, serif; text-transform: lowercase; } h3 { font-size: 40px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; margin-top: 40px; text-transform: lowercase; } p { width: 960px; margin: 40px auto; color: #000; line-height: 200%; } a, a:visited { color: #000; font-size: 12px; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } ul { list-style: none; } .

微博数据可视化 body { background: #ffc19f; font-family: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif; font-size: 30px; text-align: center; margin: 0; padding: 0; } h1 { font-size: 70px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; font-family: 'Chelsea Market', Georgia, serif; color: #000; line-height: 1; } h2 { font-size: 60px; font-weight: normal; margin: 0; color: #cc4037; font-family: 'Chelsea Market', Georgia, serif; } h3 { font-size: 40px; font-weight: normal; color: #7d1f19; margin: 0; margin-top: 40px; text-transform: lowercase; } p { width: 960px; margin: 40px auto; color: #000; line-height: 200%; } p a { color: #FFF font-size: 40px; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; background-color: #06406c; padding: 10px 15px; border-radius: 10px; text-decoration: none; } p a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } a, a:visited { color: #000; font-size: 12px; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } ul { list-style: disc; margin: 0; padding: 0; } ul li a { font-size: 24px; color: #cc4037; } .
